casebody.data:
Jefferson Patten, Jr., et al., Respondents, v. Richard Pancoast, et al., Appellants. Decided March 1, 1886. Appeal from judgment and from order denying motion for new trial. John L. Logan, for appellants. Cephas Brainerd, for respondents.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and O’Gorman, J.

Opinion by O’Gorman, J. Judgment and order affirmed, with costs.
